name: You are Haunted
description:
- You are haunted ! Can you survive ? Look... Looook.... And don't die.

This game was made in total *30 hours something, was a fun challange.

  • Game time is around: 5 - 10 min
  • IN GAME CONTROLLS:
    Movement: WASD
    Look around: Mouse
    Interact with objects: E
    Menu: ESC
